episodios.nome: Koumei Who Stands in Opposition, the Freeing of Rikuson the Crimson at Koutou
Rikuson at a Loss, His Discovery of Chuubou Sonken in Go's Capital
Assemble at Koutou's Lands, Young Patriots
The One-Eyed Hero Entrusts Ryoutou with the Principles of a Warrior
A Grieving Ryoutou Roars in Agony as he Hunts Down a Bitter Enemy
In His Sorrow, Kannei of Bells, Shoots an Arrow into the Battlefield
A Bewildered Rikuson Sees the Light in a Reunion with His Teacher
Koumei Shoukatsuryou Inspires Sonken of Go with His Idea
The Young Warriors Assemble at Koutou's Hills and Rivers for Training
Sou Moutoku Pushes a Red Wall, Drawing Near Sun Go
Go's Six Steeds Cause the Dawn Over Choukou to Gleam Red
Ingenuity and Cunning, the Sound of the Ominous Flute Reverberates Across the Lake Shore
The Handsome Youth Stands Upon the Battlefield to Guide Rikuson
The Wail of Go Wavers in Repose Offered by the Six Steeds
Gloomy Rikuson, Sonken Vows to Recover his Smile
Kan'u's Roar Strikes Rikuson Which Forces Him to Hold Determination
Reunion at the Thatched Hut, the Deep Connection Between Master and Disciple, Wedged Together in Yizhou
The Sworn Brothers of Taoyuan See the Flower of Ties in the Fields and Mountains of Shu
Courageous Taishiji Stands Tall on the Earth of the Central Plains
Shimei Ryomou of Go Rises from Obscurity by Using His Young Wisdom
Jiang Ling's Setting Sun Seizes a Warrior's Soul
Ryuubi Goes Insane and Becomes a Frozen Shadow Wandering in Go
Chuubou Sonken, in the Snowfield, Follows Rikuson to Escape from His Homeland
Ryuubi's Weeping Gives a New Light to the Field
Rikuson Hakugen Dances on the Go Plains Where Red Stars Are Falling

metadata_completo.sinopse:
The Imperial Seal has been passed down through the generations since ancient times. It confers great power unto the warriors that it chooses. This is the story of those warriors.

It is a time of chaos and of civil war. It is a time when great armies clash in titanic battles and great heroes carve their names in history. It is also a time of death and destruction, when the people of the land live in constant fear of the sword. Onto this stage steps the reluctant Rikuson (Lu Xun), whose family had been the guardians of the Imperial Seal up until it was stolen by Sonsaku. At the behest of his mentor Rikuson offers his services to Sonsaku with the intention of confirming the will of the Imperial Seal. However, assassins strike down Sonsaku and the Imperial Seal is lost. So begins, Rikusonâ€™s journey to recover the Imperial Seal and discover his destiny.

(Source: AniDB)
